Main.TextJPN: ……ソファーに横になり、…ぼんやりと時間を過ごした。
Main.TextENG: ...I lay down on the couch... and stayed there dazed for a while.

Main.TextJPN: すっかり頭の中が空っぽになり、……何を考えても形にまとまらなかった。
Main.TextENG: My mind was completely blank... I couldn't think about anything for more than a few seconds.

Main.TextJPN: 家には書置きがあり、親父とお袋は帰りが深夜になるから、ラーメンでも作って食べててくれ、とのことだった。
Main.TextENG: There was a note in my house saying that Mom and Dad would be home late and that I should have some ramen or something for dinner.

Main.TextJPN: 食べる気ならいつでも作れるし、…それに食欲も湧かなかったので、…何も口にせず、ただぼーっと天井を眺めて過ごした。
Main.TextENG: I could make it whenever I got hungry... but I had no appetite... so I just stared blankly at the ceiling without eating anything.

Main.TextJPN: 時計の針が…もうじき夜の１０時を指す。
Main.TextENG: The hands of the clock... were already pointing at ten.

Main.TextJPN: ……今日も、…あの電話は掛かってくるのだろうか。
Main.TextENG: ...Would I get... another phone call like that today?

Main.TextJPN: ……すでに詩音は失踪しているのに。
Main.TextENG: ...Even though Shion had already disappeared...

Main.TextJPN: ……それでも詩音から電話は掛かってくるのだろうか。
Main.TextENG: ...Would she still call me?

Main.TextJPN: その電話はどこから……誰から……。
Main.TextENG: Where were they calling from... and who were they...?

Main.TextJPN: 考えれば考えるほどに……体が震え出す…。
Main.TextENG: The more I thought about it... the more I started to tremble...

Main.TextJPN: 電話線をいっそ引っこ抜いてしまおうかとまで考えた。
Main.TextENG: I even thought about just disconnecting the phone line.

Main.TextJPN: ……自分に理性があとちょっと足りなかったなら、本当にそうしたに違いない。
Main.TextENG: ...If I had been thinking a little less logically, I really would have done it, too.

Main.TextJPN: …でも待てよ、前原圭一。
Main.TextENG: ...Hold on, Keiichi Maebara.

Main.TextJPN: …大石さんも自分で認めたじゃないか。
Main.TextENG: ...Ooishi-san admitted it himself, didn't he?

Main.TextJPN: 詩音は所在不明なことが多いって。
Main.TextENG: That Shion went missing a lot?

Main.TextJPN: 大石さんの知らない親類の家で今日まで過ごしてたってのは考えられることじゃないのか？
Main.TextENG: Couldn't she have just gone to relatives that Ooishi-san didn't know about and have been there ever since?

Main.TextJPN: 俺も詩音も、何者かに狙われる身なんだから…、普段とは違う場所に身を隠そうと思ったって何の不思議もないはず…。
Main.TextENG: Shion and I were both being targeted by somebody... so it wouldn't be strange to think she went somewhere she usually didn't in order to hide...

Main.TextJPN: …だから大石さんは詩音の所在を見つけられず、失踪と決め付けてしまったに違いないのだ。
Main.TextENG: ...That must have been why Ooishi-san couldn't locate her—and why he labeled her a disappearance.

Main.TextJPN: …そうだ、そうに違いない！@k　詩音は失踪なんかしてはいないのだ…！！
Main.TextENG: ...Yeah, that had to be it!@k Shion hadn't disappeared at all...!!

Main.TextJPN: その時、自分の意志とは無関係に右手が動き、ピシャリと頬を叩いてくれた。
Main.TextENG: Then, my right hand moved of its own volition and slapped me on the cheek.

Main.TextJPN: そのひんやりとした手の感触が、わずかな冷静さを取り戻させてくれた…。
Main.TextENG: Its cold sting let me calm down a little...

Main.TextJPN: 「……………都合良く考えすぎるなよ、前原圭一……」
Main.TextENG: ``............Don't just convince yourself of the most convenient possibility, Keiichi Maebara...``

Main.TextJPN: ……失踪を認めたくないのはわかる。
Main.TextENG: ...I knew I didn't want to admit she had disappeared.

Main.TextJPN: …それを認めるのは、…きっととてつもなく恐ろしいことに違いないからだ。
Main.TextENG: ...Admitting it... would mean that something terrifying was definitely happening.

Main.TextJPN: ……電話の相手に、…詩音かどうか確かめればいい。
Main.TextENG: ...I just needed... to figure out whether Shion was the one on the phone or not.

Main.TextJPN: ………詩音に、お前は本当に詩音かって確かめるのか…？
Main.TextENG: ......Would I ask her if she was actually Shion...?

Main.TextJPN: ……それはとんでもなく滑稽な話に思えた。
Main.TextENG: ...That seemed like an incredibly absurd thing to do.

Main.TextJPN: 「……でも、…逃げるな圭一」
Main.TextENG: ``...Still... don't run from this, Keiichi.``

Main.TextJPN: 向こうが、自分が詩音だと思われているとまだ信じているなら、…それは俺にとってほんのちょっとの優位だ。
Main.TextENG: If the person on the other end still believed that I thought she was Shion... then that gave me a tiny advantage.

Main.TextJPN: さり気なく…本当にさり気なく、…会話を聞き、@k受け、@k流す。@k…化けの皮を剥いでやるんだ…。
Main.TextENG: Casually... completely casually... ...I would listen to what she had to say...@k and fend@k her off.@k ...I would tear the skin off the monster...

Main.TextJPN: 確かにそれはとても恐ろしいことだ…。
Main.TextENG: It would definitely be really scary for me...

Main.TextJPN: でも、……あの晩、祭具殿に忍び込んだ人間の、…最後の生き残りとして……俺がやらねばならない責務なのだ。
Main.TextENG: However... as the last survivor... of the people who went into the storehouse that night... this was my duty to perform.

Main.TextJPN: でも、……なら誰が……詩音のふりをして電話をしているんだ……？
Main.TextENG: Still...... then who...... Who would call me and pretend to be Shion......?

Main.TextJPN: 電話の声とは言え…、そんな簡単に似せられるものじゃない。
Main.TextENG: I may have only heard her over the phone... but her voice shouldn't be that easy to replicate.

Main.TextJPN: …あの声は確かに詩音だ。@k…詩音にそっくり。@k…詩音そのものとしか思えない……。
Main.TextENG: ...That was definitely Shion's voice.@k ...It sounded just like her.@k ...It could have only been Shion...
............There was someone, though, wasn't there?

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音とそっくりに喋れるヤツが。
Main.TextENG: ...Someone who sounded just like Shion.

Main.TextJPN: ……魅音だ。
Main.TextENG: ...Mion.
............Mion.@k ......Who else... could have done this............?

Main.TextJPN: この時になって…、本当に今さらのように……。
Main.TextENG: At this point... Seriously, after all this time......

Main.TextJPN: …今日まで魅音に感じてきた数々の違和感が…心の中にあふれ出す…。
Main.TextENG: ...All those little things that didn't quite make sense about Mion until now... overwhelmed my mind...

Main.TextJPN: 祭具殿に忍び込んだことを詰問し、……呪いの言葉を吐きながらハシゴを揺らした。@k……他にも、…他にも、……………。
Main.TextENG: Like being questioned about sneaking into the ritual storehouse...... and how she shook the ladder while spouting curses.@k ...Who else... who else could have............

Main.TextJPN: でも、……どうして魅音が……？
Main.TextENG: Why, though... why would Mion...?

Main.TextJPN: 大石さんや詩音に聞いた、園崎家の話を思い出す…。
Main.TextENG: I thought back to the things about the Sonozaki family that I had heard from Ooishi-san and Shion...

Main.TextJPN: ……魅音はいつも、事件の渦中にいて……全てを知り得る立場に居て……。
Main.TextENG: ...Mion was always entangled in the incidents... in a position where she was omnipotent...

Main.TextJPN: ……その情報の中には、失踪後の『詩音』に聞かされたものも混じっていた。@k頭をガリガリと掻き毟る…！
Main.TextENG: ...Some of that information included things that 'Shion' had told me after she disappeared.@k I madly scratched at my head...!

Main.TextJPN: 勇気を…どうか勇気を…。
Main.TextENG: Courage... Give me the courage...

Main.TextJPN: ……今夜も掛かってくるに違いない電話を取る、ほんの少しの勇気を…！
Main.TextENG: ...Just a little bit of courage to pick up the phone—I know it will ring tonight...!

Main.TextJPN: 逃げるのはあまりに簡単…。
Main.TextENG: It would be so easy to run away...

Main.TextJPN: でもそれでは…自分が消されるまでの準備期間を相手にのんびりと与えることと何も変わらない…。
Main.TextENG: That, though... would be the same as making it easy for them to erase me...

Main.TextJPN: 逃げてはいけない…。
Main.TextENG: I cannot run...

Main.TextJPN: 立ち向かわなくてはいけない…。
Main.TextENG: I must stand up and face it...

Main.TextJPN: 次に犠牲になるのは間違いなく……俺なのだから。
Main.TextENG: After all, the next sacrifice...... would definitely be me.

Main.TextJPN: ……『詩音』は言葉巧みに俺をワナにかけようとしているに違いない。
Main.TextENG: ...I was sure 'Shion' would use tricky words to try and trap me.

Main.TextJPN: ……用心せよ用心せよ…。@k…怖い怖い怖い…。@k…嫌だ嫌だ嫌だ嫌だ……。
Main.TextENG: ......Be careful, be careful...@k ...I'm scared I'm scared I'm scared...@k ...I don't want to do this I don't want to do this I don't want to do this I don't want to do this...
............At that point... it rang.

Main.TextJPN: どこから掛かってきているかもわからない、…電話が鳴った。
Main.TextENG: The phone rang... and I didn't know where the call was coming from.

Main.TextJPN: …詩音は消えていた。
Main.TextENG: ...Shion had disappeared.

Main.TextJPN: …とっくに消えていた。
Main.TextENG: ...Disappeared a long time ago.

Main.TextJPN: …綿流しの次の夜には消えていた。
Main.TextENG: ...Disappeared the night after Watanagashi.

Main.TextJPN: なのに……、今日まで、…さも当り前のように電話がかかってきた。
Main.TextENG: Yet... until today... she had been calling me like nothing happened.

Main.TextJPN: …そしてそれは今夜も……。
Main.TextENG: ...Now again, tonight...

Main.TextJPN: ………消された人たちは、…死体が見つからないだけで、…生きているとは到底思えない。
Main.TextENG: ......The people that had disappeared... their corpses simply haven't been found... I really didn't think they were alive.

Main.TextJPN: …なら、この電話の主が本当の詩音なら、……それはこの世ならざる場所から掛かってくる電話なのか…？
Main.TextENG: ...So if it really was Shion on the other end... then did that mean she was calling me from another world...?

Main.TextJPN: もちろん、そんなわけはない。
Main.TextENG: Of course, that couldn't be.

Main.TextJPN: ……生きている誰かが、詩音のふりをして電話をかけているのだ。
Main.TextENG: ...A living being was calling me, pretending to be Shion.

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音はもうとっくにいないのに、……詩音はさも健在であるように…。
Main.TextENG: ...Shion was long gone... and yet, as though she were alive and well...

Main.TextJPN: 諦めることなく、…電話は鳴り続けている。
Main.TextENG: the phone continued its incessant ringing.

Main.TextJPN: 電話に…出なくて済むなら出たくはない。
Main.TextENG: I... didn't want to pick up if I didn't have to.

Main.TextJPN: …だけど、それは何の解決にもならないとさっき自ら結論したばかりだ。
Main.TextENG: ...I had just concluded, though, that not doing so wouldn't solve anything.

Main.TextJPN: では……出てどうする…？
Main.TextENG: Then... what would I do after I answered it...?

Main.TextJPN: お前は詩音じゃない、お前は何者だ、と問い詰めてみるか…？
Main.TextENG: Would I immediately declare she wasn't Shion and ask who she was...?

Main.TextJPN: それとも、騙され続けているふりをしながら、……相手の尻尾を探ってみるか…？
Main.TextENG: Alternatively, would I pretend I was still fooled... and try to grab her by the tail...?

Main.TextJPN: 「………………それが、…一番、安全かもしれないよな…」
Main.TextENG: ``............That... would probably be the safest thing to do...``

Main.TextJPN: 電話の相手が、自分が詩音でないことを見破られたと知った時、どんな行動に出てくるかが一番、怖かった。
Main.TextENG: What I was most afraid of was what the person on the phone would do when she realized I knew she wasn't Shion.

Main.TextJPN: …だが、騙され続けているように見せる限り、相手は極端な行動には出ないのでは…？
Main.TextENG: ...However, as long as I continued to let her think I was fooled, she wouldn't do anything extreme, right...?

Main.TextJPN: 用心さえすれば、きっとそれが一番安全………。
Main.TextENG: If I just make sure to be careful, that should be the safest option......

Main.TextJPN: ……心に決める。
Main.TextENG: ...I've made up my mind.

Main.TextJPN: …電話を取ろう。
Main.TextENG: ...I'll answer the phone.

Main.TextJPN: …そして、…さもいつものように話をしよう。
Main.TextENG: ...Once I do that... I'll talk to her as if nothing happened.

Main.TextJPN: だが、…今日はそれだけじゃない。
Main.TextENG: ...That wasn't all I'd do this time, though.

Main.TextJPN: …相手を探るんだ。
Main.TextENG: ...I'd scope her out.

Main.TextJPN: 何者で、…何を考えていて、…何が目的なのか。
Main.TextENG: Who was she... what was she thinking... and what was she after?

Main.TextJPN: ……何でこんなことをするのか。
Main.TextENG: ...Why was she doing this?

Main.TextJPN: 富竹さんたちを殺したのは本当にお前なのか。
Main.TextENG: Was she really the one who killed Tomitake-san and Takano-san?

Main.TextJPN: 村長さんはどうなったのか。
Main.TextENG: What happened to the mayor?

Main.TextJPN: ……梨花ちゃんと沙都子をどうしたのか…！
Main.TextENG: ...What happened to Rika-chan and Satoko...?!

Main.TextJPN: 受話器を取ろうとする腕が震える…。
Main.TextENG: I reached out for the receiver, my arm trembling...

Main.TextJPN: 聞きたいことが多過ぎて…、問い詰めたいことが多過ぎて…、…怖い。
Main.TextENG: There were too many things I wanted to know... too many things I wanted to ask... ...I was scared.

Main.TextJPN: とにかく電話を取ろう。@k…取るぞ圭一。@k取るぞ圭一！！
Main.TextENG: I should start by picking up the phone.@k ...Pick it up, Keiichi.@k Pick it up, Keiichi!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……も、…もしもし」
Main.TextENG: ``...H-Hello?``

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音からの電話でなければ、どんなに心安らかなことか………。
Main.TextENG: ...Oh, how relieved I would have been if it hadn't been a call from Shion......

Main.TextJPN: 一瞬だけでも期待した、都合のいい淡い予感は、これ以上ない形で引き裂かれる。
Main.TextENG: My momentary, convenient, and above all fleeting prediction was ripped into a thousand pieces.

Main.TextJPN: …もう震えてもしょうがない…。@k覚悟を決めるんだ……………。
Main.TextENG: ...I couldn't help shaking at this point...@k Get ready for this............

Main.TextJPN: 「電話、なかなか出なかったんで、お留守かと思って切ろうとしてたんですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``You took a long time to pick up. I thought you weren't home, and I was about to hang up.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、…あぁ、ごめん…。@k@vS02/01/130100860.ちょっとその…お風呂に入っててさ」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah... ah, sorry...@k@vS02/01/130100860. I was just... in the bath.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…それでもご家族の方が電話を取りませんか？@k@vS02/06/130600472.　ひょっとして……圭ちゃんの家、今、ご両親はお留守なんですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Did your family not pick up for you?@k@vS02/06/130600472. Could... your parents be out right now, Kei-chan?``

Main.TextJPN: 失態だ…。
Main.TextENG: I failed...

Main.TextJPN: 自宅に自分が１人しかいないという致命的な情報が伝わったことを悟る…。
Main.TextENG: I let her in on a fatal piece of information—that I was currently the only one at my house...

Main.TextJPN: 「いや別に…留守ってわけじゃ……、そ、そそ、そんな事より！！@k@vS02/01/130100862.　聞いたか？！@k@vS02/01/130100863.　梨花ちゃんと沙都子の件」
Main.TextENG: ``Well, no... They're not really... A-A-A-Anyway!!@k@vS02/01/130100862. Have you heard?!@k@vS02/01/130100863. About Rika-chan and Satoko?``

Main.TextJPN: 「いえ。@k@vS02/06/130600474.…結局、あの後、どうなったんですか？@k@vS02/06/130600475.　見つかったんですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``No.@k@vS02/06/130600474. ...What happened after that?@k@vS02/06/130600475. Were they found?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃん、どうか気を落とさないで…」
Main.TextENG: ``......Kei-chan, please don't lose hope...``

Main.TextJPN: ……もしも、…俺が大石さんに何も知らされていなかったなら。
Main.TextENG: ...If... If Ooishi-san hadn't let me know...

Main.TextJPN: ……俺はこの、詩音の気遣ってくれる言葉に薄い涙を浮かべることもできたかもしれない。
Main.TextENG: ...then I might have allowed myself to shed a tear or two at Shion's considerate words.

Main.TextJPN: ……だが、今となっては…その言葉をそのまま受け入れることは出来ない……。
Main.TextENG: ...Instead, now that it had come to this... I couldn't take her words at face value...

Main.TextJPN: …受話器の向こうのこいつが、…完璧に詩音であればあるほど、…恐ろしさが募っていく…。
Main.TextENG: ...This person on the other end of the receiver... The more perfect a Shion they were... the more my blood curdled in fear...

Main.TextJPN: 「………………梨花ちゃんと沙都子は、@k@vS02/01/130100867.………さらわれたんだよな…」
Main.TextENG: ``............Rika-chan and Satoko...@k@vS02/01/130100867. ...They were kidnapped, weren't they...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……はい。@k@vS02/06/130600478.それは間違いないでしょうね…」
Main.TextENG: ``...Yes.@k@vS02/06/130600478. I don't think there's much doubt...``

Main.TextJPN: ………それがどれほど重要で、残酷な意味を持つのか…。
Main.TextENG: ......Just how cruel and grave a meaning did those words hold...?

Main.TextJPN: その言葉の重みに…愕然とし、…そして遅れて…意識が遠のきそうになる痺れが襲ってきた。
Main.TextENG: Their weight... astonished me... and then a moment later... I was overcome with numbness and felt like I would pass out.

Main.TextJPN: …梨花ちゃんたちはさらわれたのか、と問いかけた。
Main.TextENG: ...I had asked if Rika-chan and Satoko had been kidnapped.

Main.TextJPN: …それに『詩音』は『間違いない』と答えたのだ。
Main.TextENG: ...'Shion,' in turn, had answered that there ``wasn't much doubt.``

Main.TextJPN: ……それが意味する……残酷さ………。
Main.TextENG: ...That cruel meaning... behind her words......

Main.TextJPN: 「……………梨花ちゃんと、沙都子は、……あ、いや…ッ、えぇと……、あ、ごめん。@k@vS02/01/130100869.…その………村長さんは、…さらわれて…どうなったと思う…？@k@vS02/01/130100870.　まだ……生きてるんだろうか…？」
Main.TextENG: ``............Rika-chan and Satoko were.... Ah, no... I mean... I'm sorry.@k@vS02/01/130100869. ...Umm....... About the mayor... ...What do you think happened... after he was kidnapped...?@k@vS02/01/130100870. Do you think... he's still alive...?``

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんと沙都子はさらわれてどうなった…？
Main.TextENG: What happened to Rika-chan and Satoko after they were kidnapped...?

Main.TextJPN: そう聞きそうになり、慌てて口をつぐんだ。
Main.TextENG: That's what I wanted to ask, but I frantically caught myself.

Main.TextJPN: その問いに、もしもあまりに恐ろしい答えが、…まるで他人事のように告げられたら…？
Main.TextENG: What if she had given that question... a terrifying response, in such a way to sound like it had nothing to do with her...?

Main.TextJPN: …それが怖くて、咄嗟に村長を引き合いに出してしまった。
Main.TextENG: ...I was scared of that, so I immediately brought up the mayor.

Main.TextJPN: …だが、結局のところ、村長にしたって梨……
Main.TextENG: ...That said, however much I talked about the mayor, Ri—

Main.TextJPN: 「殺されちゃったんだと思います」
Main.TextENG: ``I think he was killed.``

Main.TextJPN: 「………お、………おいおい、………そんなにあっさり……」
Main.TextENG: ``...He... ...Hey, wait... ...That was quick...``

Main.TextJPN: 「…人間をさらって、その状態を維持するのってとても大変なことだと思います。@k@vS02/06/130600481.…人質にするんでもない限り、用が済んだら殺しちゃうのが一番合理的じゃないかと」
Main.TextENG: ``...I think it must be really hard to kidnap someone and keep them like they are.@k@vS02/06/130600481. ...As long as they're not hostages, it would be most practical to kill them once you were done with them.``

Main.TextJPN: ……………足元がぐらつくくらいに世界がたわみだす。
Main.TextENG: ............The world started to bend so much I almost lost my balance.

Main.TextJPN: ……目に映る世界が、時計回りにぐるりぐるりと渦を巻き、…俺を足元から飲み込もうとした。
Main.TextENG: ...The scenery in my eyes whirled around and around like the hands of a clock... and tried to swallow me whole from below.

Main.TextJPN: …慌てて壁に手を突き体を支える。
Main.TextENG: ...I frantically put a hand on the wall to support myself.

Main.TextJPN: …少し遅れて、激しい嘔吐感がこみ上げてきた。
Main.TextENG: ...A moment later, a severe nausea welled up within me.

Main.TextJPN: 今こいつは……何てことを……あっさりと言ったんだ…？！？！
Main.TextENG: How was she... saying such things... so lightly...?!?!

Main.TextJPN: 「こ、ここ、殺しちゃうって、…そんなにあっさり…。@k@vS02/01/130100873.ひ、人の命を何だと思ってやがるんだ…ッ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: ``K-K-K-Kill them... So readily...@k@vS02/01/130100873. I-I mean, what's a human life or two, anyway...?!?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「………恐ろしいことだとは思いますが。@k@vS02/06/130600483.…多分、そうではないかと」
Main.TextENG: ``.........It's a horrible thing, but...@k@vS02/06/130600483. I think that's probably what happened.``

Main.TextJPN: 村長が殺されたということは…、梨花ちゃんや沙都子も……同じ様に殺されたかもしれないということなのか…？！？！
Main.TextENG: If the mayor was killed... then did that mean the same had happened... to Rika-chan and Satoko...?!?!

Main.TextJPN: …い、…いや、…そんなはずは……、どっかのジジイとはわけが違うぞ？！
Main.TextENG: ...N-No... That couldn't... They weren't some random old man!!

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんだぞ？！
Main.TextENG: It was Rika-chan!!

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子だぞ？！
Main.TextENG: It was Satoko!!

Main.TextJPN: そ…そんなにあっさりと……殺すはずは………！
Main.TextENG: Th-They couldn't... They couldn't kill them so readily......!

Main.TextJPN: 「梨花ちゃまと沙都子ちゃんも、…同じだと思ったほうがいいでしょうね」
Main.TextENG: ``It's probably better to think that Rika-chama and Satoko-chan ended up the same way.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うわああぁああぁああぁあぁぁああぁああぁあぁああぁああああぁあああぁああぁああぁああぁあああぁああぁああぁあぁああぁぁああぁああぁああぁあぁああぁあああ…ッ！！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh...!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 一番聞きたくない言葉を…自らの絶叫で押し潰す。
Main.TextENG: Those were the words I wanted to hear the least... and I fought them back with a scream of my own.

Main.TextJPN: …なかったことになんか、できないのに…それでも…、それでも、…俺は叫ばずにはいられなかった。
Main.TextENG: ...Even though it wouldn't change anything... Still... I still... couldn't help but scream.

Main.TextJPN: 「ぁああぁあぁ…ぁあぁあ……ぁ………ぁ………」
Main.TextENG: ``Aaahhhh... aahh... ah... ah...``

Main.TextJPN: 今度こそ、……涙がこぼれた。
Main.TextENG: This time...... the tears flowed.

Main.TextJPN: 昨夜からずっと避けてきた…もっとも恐ろしい結末を突きつけられ、…泣いた。
Main.TextENG: I'd been confronted with the most horrific outcome... that I'd been trying to avoid considering ever since last night... and I cried.

Main.TextJPN: ……それが…俺のせいであることは…もう疑う余地もなかった。
Main.TextENG: ...There was no longer... any doubt... that it was my fault.

Main.TextJPN: ……俺が殺した。
Main.TextENG: ...I killed them.

Main.TextJPN: ……俺が梨花ちゃんと沙都子を殺した。
Main.TextENG: ...I killed Rika-chan and Satoko.

Main.TextJPN: ……俺が……、心の弱さに負け…、打ち明けてしまった。
Main.TextENG: ...I... succumbed to the weakness of my own heart... and confessed everything to Rika-chan.

Main.TextJPN: …だから殺されてしまった。
Main.TextENG: ...That's why they were killed.

Main.TextJPN: …それは俺が殺したということ。
Main.TextENG: ...That meant I killed them.

Main.TextJPN: ……あの時、梨花ちゃんの無垢な瞳に見つめられても…俺が屈することなかったなら！！
Main.TextENG: ...When Rika-chan looked at me with those innocent eyes... if only I hadn't given in!!

Main.TextJPN: 俺が、……俺が……俺が…！！！
声すら枯れ果てて、……それでも、………泣いた。@k……………………泣いた。
Main.TextENG: Even my voice gave out... and yet still... I cried...@k ......................and cried.

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃん。…………どうか気を確かに…」
Main.TextENG: ``......Kei-chan. .........Please, just try and calm down...``

Main.TextJPN: …………………………梨花ちゃんと沙都子は、…………殺された。
Main.TextENG: ............Rika-chan and Satoko......... They've been killed.

Main.TextJPN: ………もう遺体すらも見つからない。
Main.TextENG: .........We couldn't even find their remains.

Main.TextJPN: ……その死に顔に、……謝ることすら、…永遠に許されない。
Main.TextENG: ...I would never be allowed... to even apologize... to their faces.

Main.TextJPN: …………それが俺への罰ならば……なんて……惨い……。
Main.TextENG: .........If that was to be my punishment... then... how brutal a punishment it was...

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音が慰めの言葉をかけているようだったが、…それらはほとんど俺の耳には入らなかった…。
Main.TextENG: ......I think Shion tried to comfort me... but I didn't hear any of it...

Main.TextJPN: 「そんなことでどうするんですか…！@k@vS02/06/130600486.　次に狙われるのは確実に…私か圭ちゃんなんですよ？！@k@vS02/06/130600487.　お願いですから…しっかりして下さい！！@k@vS02/06/130600488.　…お願いします。@k@vS02/06/130600489.…お願いしますから……！」
Main.TextENG: ``What are you going to gain by doing that...?!@k@vS02/06/130600486. They're... definitely going to target you and me next!!@k@vS02/06/130600487. Please, I'm asking you... get a hold of yourself!!@k@vS02/06/130600488. ...Please.@k@vS02/06/130600489. ...Please...!``

Main.TextJPN: 詩音もまた、目に涙を溜めるような声で懇願するように叫んだ。
Main.TextENG: Shion was shouting, imploring me with a voice that sounded like tears were in her eyes.

Main.TextJPN: だが…次第にその声に、憎しみを感じるようになってくる…。
Main.TextENG: However... I was coming to hate the sound of that voice more and more...

Main.TextJPN: この『詩音』が殺した…。
Main.TextENG: This 'Shion' killed them...

Main.TextJPN: …こいつが殺したに違いないのだ。
Main.TextENG: ...I had no doubts that this person killed them.

Main.TextJPN: ……どうして。@k…どうして？！
「どうしてだよ？！@k@vS02/01/130100879.　どうして……人をさらったり、殺したりするんだよッ？！？！@k@vS02/01/130100880.　祟りだか何だか知らないが、人の命ってのはそんなに安いのかよ？！@k@vS02/01/130100881.　あっさり消したり殺したり！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Why?!@k@vS02/01/130100879. Why... Why kidnap someone and then kill them...?!?!@k@vS02/01/130100880. Screw curses! Are people's lives really that cheap?!@k@vS02/01/130100881. Erasing them and killing them without a second thought like this!!``
``......You're right.@k@vS02/06/130600491. ...You're absolutely right.@k@vS02/06/130600492. ...It would take a demon...``

Main.TextJPN: 受話器を握りつぶしそうになる。
Main.TextENG: I felt like crushing the receiver in my hand.

Main.TextJPN: ……こいつは……いつまで他人事のつもりで…！！
Main.TextENG: ...How long... did this person plan on acting like it was someone else's problem...!!

Main.TextJPN: 腹の底のマグマが、今にも腹を焼ききってあふれ出しそうだった。
Main.TextENG: There was magma in the pit of my stomach, and it felt like it was going to erupt at any moment.

Main.TextJPN: 「なぁ詩音。@k@vS02/01/130100883.…教えてくれ。@k@vS02/01/130100884.…どうしてこの雛見沢では、綿流しの夜に人が死ななければならないことになってしまったんだ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, Shion.@k@vS02/01/130100883. ...Please, tell me.@k@vS02/01/130100884. ...Why did Hinamizawa start needing someone to die on the night of Watanagashi?``

Main.TextJPN: 「………それは私が知りたいです」
Main.TextENG: ``......That's what I'd like to know.``

Main.TextJPN: 「もうダム計画との戦いは終わったんだぞ？！@k@vS02/01/130100886.　なのに…どうしてまだ祟り足りないんだ？！@k@vS02/01/130100887.　どうしてだよ、どうしてッ！！！@k@vS02/01/130100888.　理由があるなら言ってみろよ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``The fighting over the dam project is already over and done with!!@k@vS02/01/130100886. ...Haven't enough people been cursed already?!@k@vS02/01/130100887. Why is it? Why?!?@k@vS02/01/130100888. If there's a reason, then say it, now!!!``

Main.TextJPN: …もう滅茶苦茶だった。@k…感情が堰を破ってあふれ出すのを止められない。
Main.TextENG: ...I was incoherent at this point.@k ...My emotions had broken through the dam inside of me, rushing forth, and I couldn't stop them.

Main.TextJPN: それは問いかけでなく、詰問だった。
Main.TextENG: These were not simple questions—this was an interrogation.

Main.TextJPN: …それに当の『詩音』が気付いていないのが、あまりに滑稽だった。
Main.TextENG: ...'Shion' herself hadn't realized it yet... It was just too funny.

Main.TextJPN: …滑稽でおかしくて、…涙が止まらなかった。
Main.TextENG: ...It was so funny... that I couldn't stop crying.

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃんの気持ち、私もよくわかります。@k@vS02/06/130600495.…ダム闘争はとっくの昔に終わったんです。@k@vS02/06/130600496.なのに毎年、オヤシロさまの祟りと言う名の殺人と失踪が繰り返されている」
Main.TextENG: ``...I understand how you feel, Kei-chan, I really do.@k@vS02/06/130600495. ...The dam wars ended a long time ago.@k@vS02/06/130600496. Yet, murders and disappearances keep happening every year under the guise of Oyashiro-sama's curse.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……なぜ？！@k@vS02/06/130600498.　どうしてなんですか？！@k@vS02/06/130600499.　全然関係ない人もいた、祟られるのに不相応な人だっていたのに、どうして？@k@vS02/06/130600500.　…どうしてッ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Why?!@k@vS02/06/130600498. Why is it happening?!@k@vS02/06/130600499. Some of them had nothing to do with this, and some of them didn't deserve to be cursed, so why?@k@vS02/06/130600500. ...Why?!?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「それを俺が聞いてるんだぁあああぁーーッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``That's what I'm asking yooouuuuu!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「それを私だって知りたいんですよぉおおぉおおぉッ！！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``I want to know that as much as anyone!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: はぁはぁ…！！@k　電話越しに互いの荒い息が聞こえた。
Main.TextENG: Hah, hah...!!@k Both our ragged breaths could be heard over the phone.

Main.TextJPN: 「いいですか。@k@vS02/06/130600503.…オヤシロさまの祟りなんて非現実的なものは初めから存在しません」
Main.TextENG: ``Listen.@k@vS02/06/130600503. ...Oyashiro-sama's curse never existed. It's too unrealistic.``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭ちゃんの言うとおり、村の何者かが、オヤシロさまの祟りというもっともらしい大義名分を利用して、綿流しの度に殺しと失踪を繰り返しているんです！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Just like you said, someone in the village is using the grand name of 'Oyashiro-sama's curse' as a justification for continuing these murders and disappearances every Watanagashi!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ヤツらは狡猾でした。@k@vS02/06/130600506.祟りを都合よく利用して、村の仇敵を毎年２人ずつ消し去るシステムを構築していったんです。@k@vS02/06/130600507.…そしてこのシステムで、今年は鷹野さんたちが殺された！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...They were cunning.@k@vS02/06/130600506. They've been using the curse as a convenient tool, and made a system where they would get rid of two enemies in the village every year...@k@vS02/06/130600507. and this year, that system killed Takano-san and Tomitake-san!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ２人で充分じゃねぇかよ！！@k@vS02/01/130100891.　どうして村長や梨花ちゃんや沙都子まで殺されなくちゃならないんだよッ！！@k@vS02/01/130100892.　それに俺は過去のことは今さらどうでもいいんだ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Then why wasn't that enough?!@k@vS02/01/130100891. Why did the mayor and Rika-chan and Satoko have to get killed too?!@k@vS02/01/130100892. I don't give a shit about the past!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「梨花ちゃんと沙都子がなぜ殺されなくちゃならなかったのか、その一点にしか興味はないんだ！！@k@vS02/01/130100894.　どうしてなんだ？！@k@vS02/01/130100895.　沙都子には打ち明けてすらないんだぞ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: ``The only thing I care about is why Rika-chan and Satoko needed to be killed!!@k@vS02/01/130100894. Why is that?!@k@vS02/01/130100895. I didn't say a word to Satoko, you know!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「どうして沙都子まで……。@k@vS02/01/130100897.どうしてなんだぁああぁあぁあぁあ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Why even her...@k@vS02/01/130100897. Whyyyyyyyyyyyyy?!?!``

Main.TextJPN: ………沈黙が訪れる。
Main.TextENG: ......A silence fell between us.

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音はしばらく、答えなかった。
Main.TextENG: ...Shion didn't answer for a while.

Main.TextJPN: …嗚咽。@k……泣いている…？
Main.TextENG: ...A sob.@k ...Was Shion crying...?

Main.TextJPN: 「…………………私だって何が何だかわからないんです…。@k@vS02/06/130600511.祭具殿に忍び込んだあの晩から……全てが変わってしまった……」
Main.TextENG: ``............I don't have any idea what's going on either...@k@vS02/06/130600511. Everything changed... when we went into the ritual storehouse that night......``

Main.TextJPN: …それは俺も同じだった。
Main.TextENG: ...It was the same for me.

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音のさめざめと泣く嗚咽を聞くうちに…興奮が冷めていくのがわかった…。
Main.TextENG: ......As I listened to Shion's bitter weeping... I could feel my agitation subsiding...

Main.TextJPN: 「…………あの晩、…鷹野さんたちが死んだと聞き、耳を疑いました。@k@vS02/06/130600513.……そして……すぐに気付いたんです。@k@vS02/06/130600514.……今度は、……自分が狙われる立場になったんだ、って……」
Main.TextENG: ``......When I heard... that Takano-san and Tomitake-san had been killed that night, I doubted my ears.@k@vS02/06/130600513. ...Then... I realized it instantly.@k@vS02/06/130600514. ...I realized... what sort of a position I was in now...``

Main.TextJPN: 「忍び込んだのは私たち４人。@k@vS02/06/130600516.…私と圭ちゃんだけが都合よく許してもらえるわけがない…。@k@vS02/06/130600517.…そう思った時、それがどれだけ心細くて……恐ろしいことだったか、…圭ちゃんにはわかりますよね……？」
Main.TextENG: ``The four of us snuck in there.@k@vS02/06/130600516. ...Kei-chan, you and I won't be so conveniently forgiven...@k@vS02/06/130600517. ...When I thought about that, it made my chest so tight... It was so terrifying... You know that feeling, Kei-chan, don't you...?``

Main.TextJPN: ………………その言葉には表裏はなかった。
Main.TextENG: ............There was nothing fake about her words.

Main.TextJPN: ……そして、そのまま俺の気持ちの代弁ですらあった。
Main.TextENG: ...She'd even understood how I felt.

Main.TextJPN: 「………だから私、……公由のお爺ちゃんに打ち明けたんです…」
Main.TextENG: ``...That's why I... confessed everything to old man Kimiyoshi...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……私は、みんなが入ってはいけないという祭具殿に、面白半分な気持ちで踏み入ってしまいました」
Main.TextENG: ``...All of us entered the forbidden storehouse—it was just a little bit of fun.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…いけないことだとはわかっていましたが、……本当に面白半分な気持ち、……ちょっとした探検気分のつもりだったんです……」
Main.TextENG: ``...We knew we shouldn't have done it... but it really had just been for fun... It was only a bit of exploration, that was all......``

Main.TextJPN: 「…一緒に入った鷹野さんたちは、その後すぐに殺されてしまいました…。それも…あんな惨い最期を……」
Main.TextENG: ``...Takano-san and Tomitake-san, who went in with us, were killed shortly afterward... They met such... miserable ends......``

Main.TextJPN: 「あの日から、…いつ私も襲われるのではないかと…怯えています…」
Main.TextENG: ``Since that day... I've been living in fear... of when I would be attacked...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……公由のお爺ちゃんしか助けてくれる人がいません…。……だからお爺ちゃん、……助けて、って………」
Main.TextENG: ``...There was nobody except old man Kimiyoshi who would help me... ...So I... I asked him to save me......``

Main.TextJPN: 「……公由のお爺ちゃん、…怒らなかった。@k@vS02/06/130600525.……そして、にっこり笑って、詩音ちゃんがちゃんと反省してるなら、鬼隠しになんかなるものか、…って。@k@vS02/06/130600526.…本当に……笑いながら……任せなさい…って………。……ぅぅ…ッ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Old man Kimiyoshi... he wasn't mad.@k@vS02/06/130600525. ...He smiled, and said, 'if you're really sorry, Shion-chan, then you'd never be demoned away'...@k@vS02/06/130600526. ...He really did... smile at me... and told me... to leave it to him...... ...*sob*...!!``

Main.TextJPN: 詩音は…大好きだった村長の死を思い出し、悲痛な声で泣いた。
Main.TextENG: Shion... cried bitterly, recalling the beloved mayor's death.

Main.TextJPN: ……聞く者の胸を締め付けずにはおかない、あまりに悲しい声だった……。
Main.TextENG: ...It was such a sad voice... that none who heard it could prevent it from twisting their hearts...

Main.TextJPN: ……ま、また俺は……自分の感情に流されるままに…好き放題なことを言ってしまったのだろうか…。
Main.TextENG: ...A-Again, I... did I let my emotions take over... and go off at her...?

Main.TextJPN: ……詩音は、俺と同じ境遇を持つ、…唯一の仲間のはず……。
Main.TextENG: ...Shion was in the same situation as me... She should have been my one and only comrade...

Main.TextJPN: …ドクン。
Main.TextENG: ...Thump.

Main.TextJPN: 鼓動がひとつ。
Main.TextENG: My heart pounded.

Main.TextJPN: ………心の奥底の、…もうひとりの自分が、…囁く。
Main.TextENG: ......My other self... deep within my mind... whispered to me.

Main.TextJPN: …思い出せ前原圭一。
Main.TextENG: ...Don't forget, Keiichi Maebara.

Main.TextJPN: ……村長は、綿流しの次の朝。
Main.TextENG: ...Don't forget about the mayor... on the morning after Watanagashi.

Main.TextJPN: 電話で鷹野さんたちの死を知らされ、夕方の会合の約束をした。
Main.TextENG: He was told of Takano-san and Tomitake-san's deaths over the phone and committed to a meeting that evening.

Main.TextJPN: …そして予約した病院に出掛けた。
Main.TextENG: ...He went to a hospital appointment.

Main.TextJPN: 家族にも内緒の病院へ。
Main.TextENG: He didn't tell his family.

Main.TextJPN: そして…会合の時間ぎりぎりに戻ってきた。
Main.TextENG: ...He'd only made it back just in time for the meeting.

Main.TextJPN: …そのまま集会所へ向かっていった。@k……そう大石さんは言った……………。
Main.TextENG: ...He went straight to the assembly hall.@k ...That's what Ooishi-san said..........
``............When...@k@vS02/01/130100900. did you let the mayor know...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…………ごめんな、…詩音。@k@vS02/01/130100902.……悲しい気持ちのところに追い討ちをかけるようで。@k@vS02/01/130100903.……詩音は、…打ち明けたんだよな。@k@vS02/01/130100904.公由のお爺ちゃん、つまり村長に」
Main.TextENG: ``............I'm sorry... Shion.@k@vS02/01/130100902. ......It must seem like I'm kicking you while you're down, but...@k@vS02/01/130100903. ...Shion, you... told him, right?@k@vS02/01/130100904. You told old man Kimiyoshi... the mayor?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…………いつ、…打ち明けたんだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``............When... did you let him know?``

Main.TextJPN: …詩音の…悲しい声を聞いていると自分が口にしようとしていることが怖くなる。
Main.TextENG: ...I'd begun to get scared... of saying it aloud after hearing her sad voice.

Main.TextJPN: ……だが、……俺は矛盾したことは言ってない……。
Main.TextENG: ......I wasn't saying it was contradictory, though...

Main.TextJPN: ……もし矛盾があるなら……むしろ詩音にそれを証明してもらいたいんだ……。
Main.TextENG: ...Besides, if there was a contradiction...... then I wanted Shion to explain it to me......

Main.TextJPN: 「…村長さんは重い痔を患ってて、病院にかかっていたという話は知ってるか…？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Did you know that the mayor had a severe case of hemorrhoids and had gone to the hospital for treatment...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……答えてくれ。@k@vS02/01/130100908.知らないなら知らないと答えればいい」
Main.TextENG: ``...Please, answer me.@k@vS02/01/130100908. If you didn't know, then just say so.``

Main.TextJPN: しばしの沈黙。
Main.TextENG: There was a momentary silence.

Main.TextJPN: ……やがて、何度か口ごもりながらの回答。
Main.TextENG: ...Then, after stammering a few times, she replied.

Main.TextJPN: 「…………痔だったのは、…知ってます…。@k@vS02/06/130600534.……座る時とか、辛そうでしたから…」
Main.TextENG: ``......I knew that... he had hemorrhoids...@k@vS02/06/130600534. ...It looked like sitting down was really hard for him...``

Main.TextJPN: 「病院に通ってたんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100910.…どこの病院かは知ってるよな？」
Main.TextENG: ``He was going to the hospital.@k@vS02/01/130100910. ...You know which hospital, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……………………………………ごめんなさい、それはちょっと知りませんけど…。@k@vS02/06/130600536.………でも、圭ちゃん、……それが一体、何の……、」
Main.TextENG: ``............I'm sorry, I don't know that much, but...@k@vS02/06/130600536. ......Kei-chan... What does that have to do with...``

Main.TextJPN: 詩音は、…村長が行った病院を知らない。
Main.TextENG: Shion... didn't know what hospital the mayor went to.

Main.TextJPN: …ということは、病院まで押しかけて行って打ち明けるなんてことは不可能だ。
Main.TextENG: ...That meant it was impossible for her to have gone all the way to the hospital to confess everything.

Main.TextJPN: ……行き先の病院を知らないなら、もちろん電車で出会うなんてことも、ちょっと考えられない。
Main.TextENG: ...Since she didn't know his destination, then she obviously couldn't have seen him on the train, either.

Main.TextJPN: …あと接触する可能性があったら、それは雛見沢に帰ってきてからだ。
Main.TextENG: ...If there was any other chance for her to contact him, it would have been after he came to Hinamizawa.

Main.TextJPN: しかし…電車は遅れて、こっちについたのは会合の時間も押し迫ったぎりぎりの時刻だった。
Main.TextENG: ...The train, however, had been delayed, and he only got back right before the meeting was about to start.

Main.TextJPN: ……ぎりぎりの時間。
Main.TextENG: ...He didn't have time.

Main.TextJPN: …とても、詩音の打ち明け話に付き合っている時間はないはず…。
Main.TextENG: ...There wouldn't have been enough time for him to listen to Shion spill the beans...

Main.TextJPN: 「………単刀直入に聞きたいんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100912.…詩音は、……いつ、村長に打ち明けたんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100913.どこで、いつ。@k@vS02/01/130100914.……大雑把でいいから、…教えて欲しいんだ」
Main.TextENG: ``......I want to ask you straight.@k@vS02/01/130100912. ...Shion... when did you tell the mayor about everything?@k@vS02/01/130100913. When and where?@k@vS02/01/130100914. ...Your answer doesn't have to be precise... but please, give me one.``
``............Kei-chan... Why are you asking that...@k@vS02/06/130600538. ...hic...``

Main.TextJPN: 嗚咽が耳に刺さる。
Main.TextENG: Her sob pierced into my ears.

Main.TextJPN: …自分が詩音をいじめているような錯覚に捕らわれる…。
Main.TextENG: ...I was taken by the illusion that I was bullying her...

Main.TextJPN: だが…言おう。
Main.TextENG: Even so... I'll say it.

Main.TextJPN: 俺に間違いがあるなら正してくれ…。
Main.TextENG: If I'm wrong, then please correct me...

Main.TextJPN: …俺に、本当の詩音であることを……証明してくれ…………。
Main.TextENG: ...Please, prove to me... that you're the real Shion.........

Main.TextJPN: 「…ありえないんだよ。@k@vS02/01/130100916.…村長が失踪した日。@k@vS02/01/130100917.朝から消えるまで。@k@vS02/01/130100918.……詩音には接触できる機会はありえないんだ」
Main.TextENG: ``...It was impossible.@k@vS02/01/130100916. ...The day the mayor disappeared.@k@vS02/01/130100917. From dawn until he vanished.@k@vS02/01/130100918. ...There was no opportunity for you to contact him.``

Main.TextJPN: 「村長は朝一で、誰にも内緒の大学病院へひとりで診察に出掛けた。@k@vS02/01/130100920.…詩音は今、この病院を知らないと言った。@k@vS02/01/130100921.…だから帰ってくるまで、村長と接触することはできないはずだ。@k@vS02/01/130100922.……そうだろ…」
Main.TextENG: ``The mayor left first thing in the morning for his examination at the university hospital all by himself, without telling anyone.@k@vS02/01/130100920. ...Shion, you just said you don't know what hospital he went to.@k@vS02/01/130100921. ...So you couldn't have contacted the mayor until he got back.@k@vS02/01/130100922. ...Isn't that right...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「帰りの電車が事故で遅れたので、自宅に帰ってきたのは会合の始まる直前だった。@k@vS02/01/130100924.…つまり、会合が始まるまでの時間にも打ち明ける時間的余裕はないんだ」
Main.TextENG: ``His train back was delayed by an accident, and he didn't return to his house until the meeting was about to start.@k@vS02/01/130100924. ...So there was no time for you to have told him before the meeting started, either.``

Main.TextJPN: …詩音の弱々しい嗚咽が…繰り返し聞こえる。
Main.TextENG: ...I heard Shion... repeating her weak sobs.

Main.TextJPN: ……女の子のこういう声には…機械的に胸が掻き毟られる……。
Main.TextENG: ...That sort of feminine voice... automatically ripped into my heart......

Main.TextJPN: …言っていて、……辛い………。
Main.TextENG: ...It was so... painful for me to say it......

Main.TextJPN: 「詩音も一緒に会合に出たのか……？@k@vS02/01/130100926.　そして会合の席上で、…打ち明けたのか…？@k@vS02/01/130100927.　ここで打ち明けなきゃ……もう時間がないもんな。@k@vS02/01/130100928.……村長は帰宅途中で失踪するんだから」
Main.TextENG: ``Shion, did you go to the meeting too......?@k@vS02/01/130100926. Did you attend it... and tell him there?@k@vS02/01/130100927. If you didn't... then there wouldn't have been any time left.@k@vS02/01/130100928. The mayor disappeared on his way home.``

Main.TextJPN: …詩音は会合に出たんだよな…？
Main.TextENG: ...Shion went to the meeting, didn't she...?

Main.TextJPN: 出たか出ないか。
Main.TextENG: Did she, or didn't she?

Main.TextJPN: そのあまりに簡単な問いの答えが……すぐに跳ね返ってこない。
Main.TextENG: The question was so simple to answer... but she didn't give me an immediate response.

Main.TextJPN: 「……………えっと、………実は会合に出…、」
Main.TextENG: ``.........Umm...... Actually, with the meeting, I...``

Main.TextJPN: 「あの日、詩音が行くと言ったバイトすら、君は欠勤してるんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100930.……もっと端的に言おう。@k@vS02/01/130100931.……君は、…俺と一緒に行った図書館以降、誰にも目撃されていない」
Main.TextENG: ``You didn't even go to the part-time job you said you went to that day.@k@vS02/01/130100930. ...I'll say it more directly.@k@vS02/01/130100931. ...You haven't... been seen since we were at the library together.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……園崎詩音は……。@k@vS02/01/130100933.……綿流しの翌日に、失踪したんだ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Shion Sonozaki...@k@vS02/01/130100933. ...disappeared the day after Watanagashi.``

Main.TextJPN: 電話の向こうが…静まりかえる。
Main.TextENG: The other end... fell silent as the grave.

Main.TextJPN: ……まるで、電話線が切れてしまったかのように何の気配もなく、…沈黙する…。
Main.TextENG: ...It was so quiet that it was like the phone cord had been cut... I couldn't sense anyone there.

Main.TextJPN: 「…大石さんは君がすでに失踪していると言っているんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100935.…でも、…詩音はこうして毎晩、俺に電話をかけてきてくれただろ…？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ooishi-san says you've been missing.@k@vS02/01/130100935. ...Despite that... you've been calling me every night like this, haven't you...?``

Main.TextJPN: 詩音の嗚咽が苛む。
Main.TextENG: Shion's sobs were torturing me.

Main.TextJPN: …だが、…俺は間違ったことは言っていないはず…！
Main.TextENG: ...Still... I'm pretty sure I haven't said anything wrong...!

Main.TextJPN: 「………頼む詩音。@k@vS02/01/130100937.……俺が言ったことが間違ってるなら、…そうだと言ってくれ。@k@vS02/01/130100938.詩音、頼むから……」
Main.TextENG: ``......Please, Shion.@k@vS02/01/130100937. ...If something I said was wrong... please say so.@k@vS02/01/130100938. Shion, I'm begging you...``

Main.TextJPN: 「詩音、お前は村長に会ってなんかないんだ。@k@vS02/01/130100940.…もし会ったとしたなら……、」
Main.TextENG: ``Shion, there's no way you could have seen the mayor.@k@vS02/01/130100940. ...But if you did see him......``

Main.TextJPN: ……もし、詩音に村長と会う機会が、…あの日、あるとしたらそれは…、
Main.TextENG: ......If Shion ever did have the chance to meet with the mayor on that day... then that meant...

Main.TextJPN: 「村長が会合を終えた後。@k@vS02/01/130100942.…すなわち！@k@vS02/01/130100943.　…失踪する直前、もしくは…失踪してからしかありえないんだッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...then you saw him after the meeting.@k@vS02/01/130100942. ...In other words!@k@vS02/01/130100943. ...It could have only been right before he disappeared, or else... afterward!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…くけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけ」
……ツー、ツー、というトーン音。
Main.TextENG: ...Beep... beep... went the dial tone.

Main.TextJPN: 電話が一方的に切られたと気付くまで、しばらくの間、呆然としていた…。
Main.TextENG: I stood there dazed for a while until I realized she had hung up on me.
